name: Paradisus Rio de Oro Resort & Spa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a very nice hotel and to be fair the best we have ever stayed in in the Caribbean but the standard rooms are more like 4star. The royal suites however are definitely 5 star but at $100 per night we didn't do it cos the rooms were comfortable enough and the air con was brilliant although very noisy.
reviews.title: Very close to a five star but not quite there

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Not impressed when we arrived after the long flight and sitting on the coach waiting to leave airport for half an hour then the hour journey to be told that our room wasn't ready. We were told it would be ready in half an hour so we went to the bar and returned to reception 45 minutes later we were told the room was ready and to take a seat on the golf truck. We waited there for 10 minutes and were taken to the room where the maids were still cleaning and said it won't be long.
reviews.title: Absolutely excellent - loved every minute!!!!!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After another twenty minutes we were finally able to get in the room and have a shower.
reviews.title: My Wedding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The maid was a bit hit and miss really it seemed no matter what time we went back to the room during the day she was always there, I nearly fell one the wet floor one day as it was so sloppy.
reviews.title: Its all about the staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Don't get me wrong we had a brilliant time and if I was to go back to Cuba we would definitely stay here in the royal suites.
reviews.title: PARADISE

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel from 9th October 2005 for two weeks, the hotel is very nice, the pool was open by the time we arrived which was a blessing as we were a little disappointed with the beach, however the snack bar was not. After 1 week the snack bar opened I would recommend the snack bar opposed to the beach bar, the burger and pizzas are great. The hotel is by far the best one one the beach but I feel the beach for the hotel guests is not paradise as many reviews state. I think if you have travelled to other destinations like Mexico or the Maldives the beaches are nicer. We are beach lovers but out of 14 days we only spent 1/2 day on the beach. The beach is quite narrow but gets wider and more roomy the opposite end, which is where their sister hotel is situated. The reviews never mention the smell either from the lagoon which is next to the beach, you do notice this and it is not a pleasant smell. It did not spoil our holiday but I would advise people that this is not the best side of the beach but it is the better hotel by far.
reviews.title: Good Value for your money
Just O.K.
reviews.text: The minute we arrived we were greeted by warm friendly people, we then shown to our rooms where we were told the porters would arrive a few minutes later with our cases. Two of them arrived with our cases we apologised re the tip as we only had GBP notes on us, they then said dont worry have you any UK notes, they had £5 in coins, these were no good to them so they took £10 off us and gave us the five £1 coins back. We felt a bit put out by this as they just arrived and were tired after a long trip. However after this we changed our GBP notes and had no problem when we tipped the staff.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2005
reviews.text: Cleaners - We left them presents on a number of occassions, ladies toiletries and childrens writing books and colouring pencils, they were very grateful and after that they made our towels into swans and hearts. However a few friends of ours staying in another block opposite unfortunately had items of clothing taken, this has happened on a few occassions but luckily not in our block, sadly they ignore it and ask you to claim on your travel insurance. Just to be on the safe side put anything you value in the safe or lock it away in your cases, they are not all
reviews.title: wonderful Cuba!
River of Gold
reviews.text: thieves, it is a shame as one bad person spoils it.

reviews.title: wedding
reviews.text: Food - This is amazing even the buffet was fantastic, we said it was the best buffet food we have even tasted on an AI package, the fillet mignon was superb.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We came back from Paradisus Rio De Oro about 2 weeks ago. We did stay last year in Melia Cayo Coco. Had a very nice holiday, but wanted to have a more "posh" holiday with better food and no mosquito flying around us.
reviews.title: Well, 2 resorts in 1.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled with friends
reviews.text: So instead of £1800 for 2 weeks and 2 people, we paid £3000 plus premium upgrade in Thomson flight.
reviews.title: GREAT GREAT GREAT

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: When we arrived, I knew, it is not same as Melia Cayo Coco.
reviews.title: Absolutely Incredible!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: No music and really nobody welcomed us. We waited and waited for somebody to take us to "our" new home for 2 weeks.
reviews.title: The best all inclusive holiday to date

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We waited. Then we sat down in the bar, had drink and went with our suitcases to find our room.
reviews.title: Thanks for a great birthday and anniversary
Fab Hotel
reviews.text: In line with many of the other reviews you will have read. This is a really great 5* Hotel.

reviews.title: The Best Hotel!
reviews.text: Having stayed here twice, June 04 and July 05, you will see I loved it and agree with every good comment made about the hotel, food and staff.

reviews.title: Absolutely Fantastic
reviews.text: Tips are not expected, a polite thank you is just as well received.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2004
reviews.text: But the staff do apprecaite the tips. We were advised by one, that all tips are pooled, with 50% being taken by the goverment and the other 50% divided amonst all staff (inc Kitchen staff, gardeners etc)
reviews.title: 5-Star Experience But Found Out Oct/05 Renovations Ongoing
What a trip..............
reviews.text: Hence a gift, is often much better way to show your appreciation to staff, as they get it all.

reviews.title: You will get more than your money worth
reviews.text: Myself, my wife and our 23 months old daughter just came back from the pardisus after spending one week (July 30 to Aug 6) and I have to say that the resort exceed my expectations by miles.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2005
reviews.text: First I have to say that it is a 5 stars by the Cuban scale and we have to accept that. It is not the Ritz Carlton and we did not pay for the Ritz Carlton too.
reviews.title: Honeymoon in Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005
reviews.text: I will start with the flight with Sky service which was very nice and the flight attendants were amazing too. We arrived to the airport and as I was expecting it, small and not air conditioned but who cares we are not staying there. We went through customs in about 20 min and on our way to the resort we were in an air conditioned bus with a very very nice and smiley tour guide (Angle was his name). At the resort we were greeted with very nice and cold cocktails while we were doing our check in. Some of the rooms were not available but ours were and we got a very nice room in building 39 which was in the middle way between the restaurants and the pool. The room was very clean and I mean it very clean and the AC was very cool and again I mean it very cool. We requested a Crib for my daughter by email and it was there in about half an hour after our arrival. The mini bar was stocked with water, pop and beer. We have enough towels for three of us and I’m not sure why some people complained about the hot water pressure in the hotel as it was even better that what I have in my house in Canada.
reviews.title: wonderful resort...fab. time
Fab, Fab, Fab !!
reviews.text: Now to the pool and the beach, you cannot find a better place to spend your vacation than the pool there or on the beach. The beach is long, white sand and again I do not know why people complained about not being able to find chairs on the beach or on the pool as we were able to get the chairs we want where we want at any time of the day.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005
reviews.text: Let’s talk about the food, I was little bit hesitant to go to Cuba with my daughter in here age but let me tell you that she loved their Pizza more than the one from Pizza Pizza. You will never go hungry in that place and believe me when I say it that sometimes you will stop eating to prepare yourself to the next meal. About the a la cart restaurant I would not bother about the Cuban one but for sure the Japanese as we had a wonderful time there with Juan and his tricks in cooking.
reviews.title: A real paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2005
reviews.text: As others have already written in great detail about how good this hotel is, there seems no point to repeat it all. Just to say that my partner and myself, and three girls had a wonderful time at this hotel. the staff were really friendly and helpful, the food was excellent and the whole experience was good. Particularly liked to to to the restaurant on the beach at lunchtimes (but you need to be quick as fills up quickly) nothing nicer than eating whilst listening to the gentle lapping of waves on the shoreline with a glass of wine in your hand!
reviews.title: Really Great Holiday
Oh the beach and the sea........
reviews.text: The massages that can be booked from the activities room are excellent too, although these are extra.

reviews.title: A satisfied punter
reviews.text: We did not appreciate how good this hotel was, and how well run until we went to the second leg of our trip to Cuba in Havana. The hotel there was not a patch on this one.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2005
reviews.text: My teenage girls have said they would go back to to this hotel at the drop of a hat!
reviews.title: PRDO lowdown
Loved the Rio de Oro
reviews.text: One of our best holidays by far!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed here with my partner in Feb 2010. We travelled from London, had two nights in Havana then flew to Holguin for 10 nights at the Paradisus Rio De Oro.
reviews.title: Great hotel, amazing that is exists in Cuba

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On arrival we were greeted warmly with a welcome drink, the reception area is lovely and very carribean. We were warned that because we were early arrivals we might have a wait for our room but they had it sorted for us.
reviews.title: Paradisus was not paradise for our honeymoon but was close.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First thing that struck me was the friendliness of the people, nothing is too much trouble. Make the effort to get to know the Cuban people because they are extremely bright and hard working, very interesting people, we learnt a lot about the way of life and what it's like to be Cuban.
reviews.title: Good resort not fully 5 star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service all round is great, all restaurants are adequate. Breakfast in the main restaurant was awesome, sooo much choice. We were slightly disappointed with our room, we were lucky enough to have a sea view and the room was spacious but the decor was tired (mouldy blinds, stained curtains etc) and it really needed updating.
reviews.title: Fantastic Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The only downside to the holiday was the weather. Unfortunately we had rain every single day and it was cold, we couldnt go to the beach. It wasn't warm carribean shower type rain it was grey miserble drizzle, just like we get in Britain! But that's not the fault of the hotel.
reviews.title: great for the newly wed or the nearly dead

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In point form:
reviews.title: Paradise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Travelled with Canjet and never again. If you run in o any issues or problems...service is not important to them. Two examples: it is an internation flight leaving from Montreal to Cuba instead of making you leave on the international gate, we leave on domestic gate not allowing us to use duty free.
reviews.title: fantastic lovely honeymoon in perfect surroundings
"Absolute Paradise" Can't wait to return.
reviews.text: -Luggage on return flight got lost, they find it the following day and you have to go pick it up even though the night before they say that they would deliver when it would be found because it was there all along.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My advise to all is that if you do fill a report that the your luggage is not there... to have the agent write on the form that they came and verify with you. In my situation the agent at the baggage counter did verify when completing my report however on the following day they say that it was there all along.
reviews.title: Best Ever

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: -When you write to customers relations they mention someone would call you back. It is two weeks and no such call.
reviews.title: Beautiful paradisus

aka: Paradisus Rio De Oro Resort And Spa
description: ocated in the Bahía de Naranjo Natural Park, in Playa Esmeralda, on the northern coast of Holguin province. Five-Star Ultra All Inclusive Eco-Resort with 354 rooms. Conceived only for adults aged 18 years or more. Maximum comfort and perfection in its private Royal Service area for a fabulous experience in a world apart. Recommended for weddings, honeymoons, incentive trips and wellness/spa.Guest Rooms354 rooms: 254 Junior Suite, 24 Junior Suite Deluxe, 16 Junior Suite Deluxe Ocean View, 2 Suite Deluxe, 36 Master Junior Suite Royal Service, 14 Master Junior Suite Ocean View Royal Service, 6 Master Junior Suite Luxury Royal Service, 2 Garden Villa Royal ServiceDining8 Restaurants (A la Carta, Buffet), 5 Bars
